name: Moonshot (itch) (YDOG)
description:
Blast off from earth in your spaceship using the space bar to dodge asteroids! Can you make it all the way to the moon?

This game was developed in Lua using the Love2D framework. It was submitted to the 1-Button Jam 2020 and the Game Off 2020 game jams.

Source code available at https://github.com/2020wmarvil/moonshot

Programming by Wyatt Marvil - Art and design by Brianna Ta.

Music is Frag Out by DJ ASSASS1N
